com.bitplan.persistence

Interface Postable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    User

    public interface Postable<T>
    support posting the given type via a Web Interface by transferring the content to an from a key/value map
    Author:
    wf

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> asMap()
      return my values as string map e.g. to put them as key/value pairs into a property file
      void fromMap(Map<String,String> map)
      set my values from the given map -e.g. from the Form Parameters of a Web post action
      TypeConverter getTypeConverter()
      get the type converter in used e.g. the default type converter which uses ISO dates and displays null values as empty strings
      void setTypeConverter(TypeConverter typeConverter)
      set the type convert to be used e.g. to decide how string and null values are displayed
